title: Republic Nightclub font?
content:
This might be an easy ID or not?

What is the typeface used for the text "REPUBLIC"?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100826074929im_/http:/typophile.com/files/republic_6591.jpg)

Thanks  
/Jonas
author: kneckenbauer

comments.content: [Perpetua Titling](http://web.archive.org/web/20100826074929/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1NO). I like the ornament with the R's.

Thanks for the help!

I like the R-thingy aswell!

Every letter seams to match with Perpetua Titling exept for the "U", custom edit?

/Jonas
Oh, yes, I see. The U. Hmm, could be easily customized. Just clip the leg. \*headscratch\*

You where right!

I tried it out quickly in photoshop with the osx bundled Perpetua Titling MT and with a horizontal scale of 110% it matches pretty much perfectly. The "U" is simply chopped in the middle and flipped.

Thanks for a great ID!

/Jonas
Phew. Glad you like it. You are welcome, Jones.
